subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana lost his second straight start at home and Fausto Carmona earned a long-awaited victory for the Cleveland Indians, who defeated the Minnesota Twins yesterday, 5-3.
snippet: Johan Santana lost his second straight start at home and Fausto Carmona earned a long-awaited victory for the Cleveland Indians, who defeated the Minnesota Twins yesterday, 5-3.
